:''Not to be confused with the MUD [[The Dungeons of Moria (video game)]]''

'''Moria''' is an illustrated, role-playing text-adventure video game set in [[Moria]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>{{webcite|author=Fredrik Ekman|articleurl=http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/|articlename=List of computer games and MUDs with a Tolkien theme (long)|dated=|website=[http://www.faqs.org faqs.org]|accessed=16 august 2010}}</ref> The objective of the game is to find [[Ring of Thr√≥r|Durin's Ring]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> Although commercial, it was not licensed by the [[Tolkien Estate]] or the [[Middle-earth Enterprises|Tolkien Enterprises]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
